org.milyn.delivery.sax

Class SAXToXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.milyn.delivery.sax.SAXToXMLWriter

  • public class SAXToXMLWriter
extends Object
    SAXElement to XML writer class.

    This class encapsulates the writing of SAXElement content as XML. It allows writing of start, end and text parts of an element to a supplied Writer, or to the Writer associated with any StreamResult that may have been supplied in one of the Smooks.filterSource() method.

    If you want to write text events with any of the writeText methods, you need to annotate the SAXVisitor instance provided in the constructor with the @TextConsumer Annotation.

    Author:
    tom.fennelly@gmail.com
